SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.controller.dashboard

Class GateDashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.controller.dashboard.GateDashboardController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/gates") public class GateDashboardController extends Object
Controller responsible for gate-level management operations. This controller handles the specific needs of Gate Managers, focusing on maintenance scheduling, status updates, and issue reporting. According to the system design, Gate Managers have limited permissions focused on day-to-day gate operations rather than system-wide management.

    • GateDashboardController

      public GateDashboardController(GateOperationsService gateOperationsService, GateManagementService gateManagementService, AssignmentService assignmentService)
      Constructor injection of required services. Gate Managers need access to both operational status and basic gate management capabilities, but with more limited scope than admins or operations managers.
